summary: This document is an email chain from October 9, 2020, regarding the logistics of a Special Agent dropping off a CD related to the Maxwell case. The emails coordinate the pickup of the disc by a paralegal to be taken to IT for file recovery, highlighting the time-sensitive nature of the request.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: The Special Agent is ready to pick up a disk related to the Maxwell case and is coordinating a drop-off location and time.

connections.description: The Special Agent is dropping off a CD for the Maxwell case, and E is tasked with picking it up and taking it to IT.
Both are paralegals involved in the coordination of handling the Maxwell case CD, with M suggesting E as an alternative when M is unavailable.

events.title: CD Drop-off Coordination for Maxwell Case
events.description: Email chain coordinates the logistics for a Special Agent to drop off a CD related to the Maxwell case, with a paralegal tasked to pick it up and deliver it to IT for file recovery.

keyFacts: A Special Agent is involved in delivering a CD containing evidence for the Maxwell case, indicating ongoing investigative activity.
The request to handle the CD is described as 'time sensitive,' highlighting the urgency of the evidence processing.
The email chain reveals internal coordination among legal staff (paralegals) to facilitate evidence transfer to IT for technical recovery of files.
